org.apache.ignite.stream.kafka.connect

Class IgniteSinkConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kafka.connect.connector.Connector

        • org.apache.ignite.stream.kafka.connect.IgniteSinkConnector

  • public class IgniteSinkConnector
extends org.apache.kafka.connect.sink.SinkConnector
    Sink connector to manage sink tasks that transfer Kafka data to Ignite grid.
